ThingDef.label: soap
ThingDef.description:
A smooth, gently lathering soap crafted from rich oils and aromatic essences. Its blend of natural ingredients leaves a subtle, refreshing fragrance and a silky feel.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 soap requires essence and oil for a total value of 140, and sells for 45, giving a <color=#33CC33>68.89%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 10000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.05</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>900</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>2.78</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
